scripts.build-win: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config config/webpack.config.ts --progress
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config config/webpack.config.ts --progress
scripts.dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run env && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config config/webpack.config.ts --host 0.0.0.0 --watch-poll
